column4: hmm anyone wanna take a tackle at why my laptop hangs at checking battery state?
is there a way to bypass this? is the x.org messed up not sure where to go at this point
there is a way to bypass it. try webmin, can aslo be done with "update-rc.d" but i think webmin is easier
you can get webmin through "sudo apt-get install webmin" i think
